info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 2:41AM CDT until April 16 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN PONTOTOC AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES... At 240 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ecru, or 7 miles southwest of New Albany, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... New Albany, Pontotoc, Trace State Park, Ecru, New Harmony, Etta, Furrs, Pinedale, Sherman, Thaxton, Blue Springs, Hortontown, Poolville, Esperanza, Endville, Cherry Creek, Ellistown, Rough Edge, Nixon and Union Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
